data.title: Bertha Holland (1885-1968)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Bertha Holland born 1885 Leftwich, Cheshire, England, United Kingdom died 1968 Wilmslow, Cheshire, England, United Kingdom including parents + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
[spouse(s) unknown]

[children unknown]

Problems/Questions

Profile last modified 27 Oct 2023 | Created 3 Oct 2011

This page has been accessed 187 times.

Biography

Bertha Holland was born in Leftwich, Cheshire, England.

Bertha's birth was registered in the Apr-May-Jun quarter of 1885 in the Northwich district.[1]

In the 1891 census Bertha (age 5), Scholar, was the daughter of Henry Holland in Leftwich, Cheshire, England.[2]

Henry Holland Head Married M 35 Skinner England

Elizabeth Holland Wife Married F 38 Cheshire, England

Charles Holland Son M 15 Skinner Cheshire, England

Henry Holland Son M 13 Scholar Cheshire, England

Fred Holland Son M 11 Scholar Cheshire, England

Minnie Holland Daughter F 9 Scholar Cheshire, England

Emily Holland Daughter F 7 Scholar Cheshire, England

Bertha Holland Daughter F 5 Scholar Cheshire, England

Christina Holland Daughter F 4 Scholar Cheshire, England

Florence Holland Daughter F 1 Cheshire, England

In the 1901 census Bertha (age 16) was the servant of Alfred E Stocks in Eccles, Lancashire, England.[3]

Alfred E Stocks Head M 30 Manchester, Lancashire, England

Edith A Stocks Wife F 27 Manchester, Lancashire, England

Marjorie E Stocks Daughter F 2 Swinton, Lancashire, England

Emily Holland Servant F 17 Northwich, Cheshire, England

Bertha Holland Servant F 16 Northwich, Cheshire, England

In the 1911 census Bertha (age 25) was the single servant of George Fearn in Overdale Dean Row Wilmslow, Wilmslow, Cheshire, England.[4]

George Fearn Head Married M 65 Retired Brewer Sheffield

Ellen Thompson Servant Single F 44 Ughill Sheffield

Mary Ellen Stubbs Servant Single F 29 Church Cappenhall

Bertha Halland Servant Single F 25 Davenham

Bertha (age 29) married Kenneth Ledwards Booth (age 26), son of Joshua Booth on 19 June 1915 in Wilmslow, Cheshire, England.[5]

In the 1939 register Bertha (age 54), Unpaid Domestic Duties, was recorded as married at 76,, Wilmslow, Cheshire, England.[6]

Kenneth L Booth Married M 13 Jun 1889 ?? Mechanic

Bertha Booth Married F 19 Feb 1885 Unpaid Domestic Duties

Bertha's death (age 82) was registered in the Oct-Nov-Dec quarter of 1968 in the Macclesfield district.[7]

Bertha was mentioned on a memorial in Wilmslow Cemetery, Wilmslow, Cheshire East Unitary Authority, Cheshire, England with a death date of 17 December 1968.[8]

Memorial Inscription:

In treasured memory of Kenneth Ledwards the dear husband of Bertha Booth died Nov 29th 1952 in his 62nd year. Also Bertha his dearly beloved wife [who] died Dec 17th 1968 aged 82 years.
